title: Creme de la Creme
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bakery restaurant also catering to vegan diners with vegan meals upon request for eat-in or take out. Uses Earth Balance place of butter; almond or coconut milk to strictly comply with vegan ideals. Vegan choices might include shepherds pie, portabello mushroom topped with mashed potatoes, eggplant and basil sandwich, pasta shells stuffed with cashew cheese, crab cakes, and almond cake.
